subject: Re: Car PDS, TMD & AIG Updates
preview: Hi Joel,  Yes the AiG appears to be correct now on mobile.  Rebecca

full_threads.body:
Hi Joel,

Yes the AiG appears to be correct now on mobile.

Rebecca

Hi Rebecca,

Thanks for checking!

This might’ve been a cached version showing on your end earlier. We’ve gone ahead and cleared both the site and server cache again just to be sure.

When you get a chance, could you try loading the site again in an incognito window?
  • Make sure to close any other incognito tabs first, that helps ensure you’re seeing the latest version.

Let me know how it goes!

Thanks Joel,

The TMD is now updated but the AIG is still an old one.

Thanks
Rebecca

Hi Rebecca,

Hope you're doing well!

We found the issue, there was a custom redirect set up on the site, which we've now disabled. We also adjusted the cache settings to 1hr to help things run more smoothly.
When you have a moment, could you please try accessing the site again, ideally in an incognito window? That’ll help ensure you’re seeing the most up-to-date version.

Hello Andy and Wolf Team,

Further to Natalie's email it appears that the recent Car document updates have not all been reflected in mobile view.

Specifically, the direct links to the AIG and TMD documents in the below (and attached) sections of the site on mobile view.



Can you please address this as a matter of urgency and priority this morning.

This seems to be a recurring issue with the mobile view. Are there steps you can take to ensure that as part of the update process mobile view is double checked and confirmed?

Thanks

Rebecca

Sent from Outlook for iOS

Thanks Joel,

The ordering of the previous docs still doesn't look to be fully chronological, as per the below screenshot.

Best regards,
Nat.

Hi Natalie,

Apologies on this one - that’s on me.

We've now corrected the heading to the correct PDS/FSG, and the Previous Policy Documents section has been updated so that all documents are listed in reverse chronological order with the newest at the top and the oldest at the bottom. This update has been applied consistently across all filter tabs: All, AIG, CHG, PDS/FSG, and TMD. Would you mind taking a quick look to confirm that everything is now appearing correctly on your end?

Really appreciate your patience, and thank you again for flagging those details. Please don’t hesitate to reach out if there’s anything else you’d like us to tweak.

Hi,

Thanks again, we're mostly there, but I have noticed that in the Previous Policy Documents section that the heading is showing PDS/SFG and should be PDS/FSG.

Also, it doesn't seem that the documents are appearing in chronological order either, so we need the oldest dated documents near the bottom and the newest at the top and for this to be applied to all of the filters (All, AIG, CHG, ODS/FSG, TMD), i've highlighted the dates as an example on the docs in the top section and as you can see they are not chronological.

Best regards,
Nat.

HI Natalie,

I hope you are doing well.

Confirming the page has been update. We have cleared the site and server cache.

Let us know if this works for you?

Hi,

We have noticed a few issues within the Previous Policy Documents and one on the Policy Documents section, which I have listed below and highlighted the corresponding areas on the screenshots below. Please can these updates be applied with immediate effect?

PREVIOUS POLICY DOCUMENTS


  1. Where you have added the filter for the type of documents, please can you combine the FSG and PDS to display as 'PDS/FSG' and show all of these documents together in chronological order?
  2. Please can you update the highlighted text for the PDS and FSG document to read as follows? 'between 25 July 2024 - 7 July 2025.'
  3. Please can you update the highlighted text for the AIG document to read as follows? 'between 24 June 2024 - 7 July 2025.'
  4. Please can you update the highlighted text for the TMD document to read as follows? 'between 25 July 2024 - 7 July 2025.'
  5. Please remove the highlighted CHG link and text as this is the current version that has not been updated? This is displayed correctly in the Policy Documents section and should remain there.




POLICY DOCUMENTS


  1. Please can you update the highlighted text on the AIG to include the day as 'on or after 8 July 2025? The 8 is missing.


Best regards,
Nat.
Just closing this, replied on a different email.

Hi all,

Thank you for getting this done.

There was a lot of back and forth today between teams and delays in updates. I would love to understand what has occurred and why to ensure a smoother process going forward.

Andy, if this is something you can please address and perhaps jump on a call with a Stella team that would be great.

Thanks,

Kind regards,

Alena Goryunova

Head of Growth & Partnerships

m 0406 785 685

e alena.goryunova@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

Hi Joel,

Looks like most of the updates are there, just something I noticed below where the wording in this section differs on each document. For consistency, please can we get the highlighted text updated to display 'on or after'.



Also the 'Previous Policy Documents' page does not appear to be in order, if you look at points 3 & 5 in the original request we would like these to appear in date order, so the most recent ones first and so on, so for e.g. the documents that ended on 7th July 2025 should be display first and they are not.

Best regards,
Nat.

Hi Natalie,

I hope you're doing well!

I'm just jumping in here on behalf of Glen and Allie. We've made some updates to the site, could you please give it another try when you get a chance?

If you're still having any issues, would you mind sending through a screenshot of what you're seeing? That will really help us troubleshoot more effectively.

Hi Glen,

None of the changes I have requested have gone live. Please can this be done asap?

Best regards,
Nat.

Hi Glen,

Still seems not to be updated on our end, let me know if there is a time lag between dev and prod.

In addition, can you please let us know about the other items sent in the earlier email

Thank you

Kind regards,

Alena Goryunova

Head of Growth & Partnerships

m 0406 785 685

e alena.goryunova@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hi,

The AIG has been successfully updated to the version you provided.

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Glen Tenorio

Could we also please have the AIG updated to the one attached?

Thank you

Kind regards,

Alena Goryunova

Head of Growth & Partnerships

m 0406 785 685

e alena.goryunova@stellainsurance.com.au

w stellainsurance.com.au

Hi Allie, Thank you for the update. A few things,
  • PDS is still not updated in the drop down menu for car (see attached)
  • Car page, link under what's included (see attached) - link https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/pds/
  • Car page, under what's optional (see attached) - same link, there are a few more placements on the site but they all have the same link as - https://www.stellainsurance.com.au/pds/
Can we please get this fixed up as soon as possible? In addition, is there a reason why the previous documents are still in the "Policy Documents" section of the page and not in the "Previous Policy Documents" (attached for your reference). The following should be in the Previous section: Product Disclosure Statement (PDS) and Financial Services Guide (FSG) This combined PDS and FSG applies to new policies purchased on or after 25 July 2024. Additional Information Guide (AIG) Read this guide if your policy has a commencement date after 24 June 2024. Target Market Determination (TMD) This TMD applies to new policies purchased on or after 25 July 2024. Product Disclosure Statement (PDS) This PDS applies to new policies purchased between 1 December 2023 - 30 April 2024. Additional Information Guide (AIG) Read this guide if your policy has a commencement date between 1 September 2022 - 30 April 2024. Financial Services Guide (FSG) This FSG applies to new policies purchased between 1 September 2022 - 30 April 2024. Target Market Determination (TMD) This TMD applies to new policies purchased between 1 September 2022 - 30 April 2024. Complaints Handling Guide (CHG) Read this guide for how to make a complaint for policies purchased between 1 September 2022 - 30 April 2024. Thank you Kind regards, Alena Goryunova Head of Growth & Partnerships m 0406 785 685 e alena.goryunova@stellainsurance.com.au w stellainsurance.com.au
(Time:30mins)
